title: The Masked Singer: Laila Ali takes off Panda mask as former undefeated pro boxer leaves hit Fox show
text:
Laila Ali after performing in a Panda costume revealed her identity on Wednesday's episode of The Masked Singer.

The 41-year-old former undefeated pro boxer and daughter of late boxing legend Muhammad Ali suffered two losses during the one-hour episode on Fox.

Panda first faced off against Flamingo as four costumed singers competed against each other as part of Group C.

Singer unmasked: Laila Ali revealed her identity after performing as Panda on Wednesday's episode of The Masked Singer on Fox

The Chinese bear sang the Kelly Clarkson hit song Stronger (What Doesn't Kill You) while Flamingo delivered a smooth rendition of Sucker by Jonas Brothers.

The studio audience and panelists Robin Thicke, Jenny McCarthy, Ken Jeong and Nicole Scherzinger declared Flamingo the winner.

Robin, 42, jokingly guessed that Laila was underneath the mask after watching the clues package, but wasn't convinced.

Panda after losing to Flamingo was forced to compete in a Smackdown with Leopard who earlier lost to Black Widow during their pairing.

Chinese bear: Nick Cannon interviewed Panda during the one-hour show on Fox

Animals battle: Panda competed against Leopard in a Smackdown after they both lost their Group C pairing

Spider singer: Black Widow earlier took on a Whitney Houston song and beat out Leopard during their pairing

The panelists: Robin Thicke, Jenny McCarthy, Ken Jeong and Nicole Scherzinger tried to guess the identity of the masked singers

Laila gave a major clue as she sang All I Do Is Win by DJ Khaled during the Smackdown while Leopard belted out Respect by Aretha Franklin.

The panelists declared Leopard the winner and the judges made their final guesses.

Jenny, 46, thought it could be Wanda Sykes, while Ken, 50, bet on it being Queen Latifah, as Robin picked Loni Love and Nicole, 41, went with Venus Williams.

Major clue: gave a major clue as she sang All I Do Is Win by DJ Khaled during the Smackdown

Final guesses: Nick Cannon asked the panelists for their final guesses

Tennis player: Nicole guessed that Venus Williams was under the Panda mask

Big surprise: Robin, Jenny, Ken and Nicole were surprised to see Laila under the mask

'We are all over the place,' Jenny said.

Laila after revealing her identity said the Panda suit was hot but the show was fun since she's 'always loved to sing'.

'I've always been shy about singing, but it was fun to perform without anyone knowing,' Laila said.

Perfect record: Laila finished with a 24-0 pro record during her boxing career from 1999 to 2007

The champ: She is the daughter of legendary late boxer Muhammad Ali

Greatest family: There were some big hints during Panda's clues package about her identity

Group competition: Group C competed Wednesday after Group A and Group B performed last week during the season premiere

She added: 'I will say, this is the first time I've ever lost something like this. It was very humbling, but it's been fun.

Nick pointed out that she was undefeated as a boxer before Laila, who finished with a 24-0 career record from 1999 to 2007, gave a swan song performance of Stronger.

Black Widow earlier impressed after taking on the Whitney Houston song I Wanna Dance With Somebody as she beat Leopard who sang Somebody To Love by Queen.

The Masked Singer premiered last week on Fox and figure skater Johnny Weir, 35, and pro gamer Ninja, 28, were eliminated after losing in round competition and then in a Smackdown.

Swan song: Laila gave an encore performance of Stronger after taking off her mask
description: The 41-year-old former undefeated pro boxer after performing in a Panda costume revealed her identity on Wednesday's episode of The Masked Singer.
